favourite.article: Yes Lord. Bless me with hours and minutes and moments too of talks alone with Thee. Be real to me and all by brothers and sisters each day.
REALLY LOVE IT..... YES, EXPERIENCE THE LORD MORE WITH THIS...AMEN!!!
There is nothing sweeter than to be blessed by the Lord, by His presence and by the abundant supply of the Spirit!

bless me Lord with day and night. if talks alone with Thee. i feel satisfied. thus,i know you my dear Lord. bless me, lord with day and night until i see the morning stars shine. LORD, BLESS YOUR CHILDREN DAY AND NIGHT TO ETERNITY. STRENGTHEN OUR INNER MAN SO THAT WE WILL BE YOURS AND YOU WILL BE OURS. WITH HOURS, AND MINUTES, MOMENTS TOO THAT I WOULD THUS KNOW THEE ON THE THRONE OF GOD. HALELUYA..
